Name: Dorothy Hawkins
Comment: The response to this improvement was positive. It was received well and the requests were limited to small requests like being able to customize the color of your name so that it would also appear in the picklist with a color gradient.

Name: Dorothy Hawkins
Comment: In the traditional model of the CMS content producers have to either remember their password or reset it periodically. This is a problem for several reasons. First it forces the user to make an active decision about every single login attempt.
